name: BT Broadband Profile Test
description: Test the Bt_broadband profile by navigating to BT Wholesale and clicking My Apps
_comment_session: Use the Bt_broadband profile for authenticated session (cloned for testing)

steps.prompt: If a login page appears, type 'nterizakis' as the username, and in the next screen verify that password was filled in automatically, and click Next button. Otherwise or after a successful login, click on the 'Open App' of the Enhanced Broadband Availability Checker on the bottom right of the screen

Click on the Address Checker tab and Fill in the address form with these details: - Building Number field: 1 - Street/Road field: 'Church View' - PostCode field: 'DN12 1RH'. Then click the Submit button.
If an address list appears, select the closest match to 1 Church View, DN12 1RH and click submit, otherwise continue to next task.

Extract the broadband availability information from the results page.- Exchange name (e.g., "KINGSLAND GREEN") - Cabinet number (e.g., "Cabinet 9") - VDSL Range A downstream and upstream rates - Availability status
